# Kill any existing axi session /usr/local/bin/tmux kill-session -t axi 2>/dev/null || true
# Start new tmux session with the server /usr/local/bin/tmux new-session -d -s axi -c "$HOME/etc/git/axi-server"
# Set environment and start server /usr/local/bin/tmux send-keys -t axi 'export AXIDRAW_PORT=9700' Enter /usr/local/bin/tmux send-keys -t axi 'export AXIDRAW_AUTO_CONNECT=true' Enter /usr/local/bin/tmux send-keys -t axi 'node src/index.js' Enter
